titles.title: Savings Enhancement for Education in College Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain individuals a credit against income tax for contributions to 529 plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/6/2013--Introduced. Savings Enhancement for Education in College Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a tax credit for contributions to qualified tuition plans; and (2) allow an exclusion, up to $600, from the gross income of an employee for employer contributions to a qualified tuition program.
